name: Baby Fish Adventure
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** ADORABLE, CUTE BABY FISH GAME! **

You're a cute little baby fish on a big adventure to explore the big ocean. Swim and avoid scary obstacles such as squids, octopus, and big sea turtles!

FEATURES

- Cute, adorable baby fish characters.
- Everything unlocked. Nothing to buy!
- Original Soundtrack.
- Fun for the whole family! Even grandma will love this!
